name: ShapeRekt
description:
Made for the 48 hour 2021 GMTK Jam. Please leave a rating at: https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2021/rate/1081426

In ShapeRekt, you play as a tiny abstract ship, building yourself up to pass through portals and escape your pursuers. Adding pieces onto your ship may come with unintended consequences...

Note: After you play through some, check the Level Select for Level X-X. It was too hard to put into the main game, but try it if you're up for a challenge!

Controls: 
Use WASD or Arrows.

Created in Unity by Chris Nearman and Adam Pettyjohn for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam.

Tools:
Unity
Adobe Photoshop
FL Studio
